"I find in favor of the defense."

You sat back, almost amazed. You'd actually beaten the odds against Buxley in Jones' courtroom!

Karen wraps you up in a greasy bearhug, compressing you against her left tit and popping your back. When she released you, you looked over and saw Buxley and Alexis staring at you, stony-faced and calculating. You realized you might not have as much reason to celebrate as you thought just because you won.

The judge ordered $1500 to Karen for court costs and dismissed the case.

1. As you leave the courthouse, an (obviously) physically unimpeded Alexis snatches you and gets her revenge.

2. When you get home, you are alarmed to find Dana Buxley waiting there for you. You can't read her mood at all.
1553322222333112.title: The defense. You won!

info.brief_description: You're the only male at your job and keep getting squashed by your BBW coworkers.
info.description:
You're Stan. A young guy, only 4ft. tall, just trying to earn a living at your job, but your BBW boss, coworkers, and even customers keep finding new ways to accidently sit on and smother you (sometimes, even on purpose).
Can you make it through the work week, or will your job end up being stuck to a woman's behind?

Rules:
Focus on the Squashing and smothering.
Keep Chapters readable (i.e. good grammar, spelling).
